title: Supply Chain Analytics Intern
description: Analyze supply chain data to identify optimization opportunities and cost reduction strategies. Support inventory management and demand forecasting activities. Learn about logistics software and help implement process improvements.

title: Warehouse Operations Intern
description: Support warehouse management activities including inventory tracking and order fulfillment. Learn about automated warehouse systems and quality control processes. Assist in optimizing storage layouts and improving operational efficiency.

title: Logistics Coordinator Intern
description: Coordinate shipment scheduling and track cargo movements across different transportation modes. Assist in documentation requirements for import/export operations. Learn about customs clearance and international trade regulations.

title: Transportation Planning Intern
description: Optimize delivery routes and fleet utilization for cost-effective transportation. Work with GPS tracking systems and route optimization software. Support driver management and vehicle maintenance scheduling.

title: Freight Management Intern
description: Manage freight operations including carrier selection, rate negotiation, and shipment tracking. Assist in freight audit processes and cost analysis. Learn about different shipping modes and international freight forwarding.

title: Cold Chain Management Intern
description: Monitor temperature-controlled logistics for pharmaceutical and food products. Support cold storage facility operations and temperature monitoring systems. Learn about regulatory compliance for cold chain transportation.

title: E-commerce Logistics Intern
description: Support last-mile delivery operations and customer order fulfillment for online retailers. Work on return merchandise management and customer service coordination. Assist in delivery performance optimization and cost reduction initiatives.

title: Procurement Intern
description: Support vendor selection processes and purchase order management activities. Assist in supplier relationship management and contract negotiations. Learn about sourcing strategies and cost analysis for procurement decisions.

title: Export-Import Operations Intern
description: Support international trade documentation and customs clearance procedures. Assist in letter of credit processing and trade finance operations. Learn about Incoterms and international shipping regulations.

title: Supply Chain Technology Intern
description: Implement supply chain management software and visibility platforms. Work on IoT integration for shipment tracking and predictive analytics. Support blockchain implementation for supply chain transparency.
